attributes.action: Extend nhs dental care exemption for mothers to at least 18 months.
attributes.additional_details: Hopefully this will improve wellbeing of new mothers who like myself have had dental issues which are unresolved. Therefore improving general health.
attributes.background: Extend period of exemption to at least 18 months after birth so mothers are able to improve dental health which often detoriates during pregnancy and postpartum. I myself require fillings and root canal which rightly has been put on hold to protect dental staff from Covid 19.
